item.title: Korasi feezes client[PI]
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

I used this Tut… http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,484089.0.html

I converted this: if(i == ****){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.aString170 = "Korasi`s sword"; class8.aByteArray178 = "The sword of a Void Knight.".getBytes(); class8.anInt174 = 57784; class8.anInt181 = 700; class8.anInt190 = 60; class8.anInt198 = 1400; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -25; class8.anInt194 = -60; class8.anInt165 = 57780; class8.anInt200 = 57784; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; }
to this… case 15099: itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.modelID = 57784; //drop model itemDef.anInt165 = 57780; //male wield model itemDef.anInt200 = 57784; //femArmModel itemDef.modelZoom = 700; itemDef.modelRotationY = 60; itemDef.aByte154 = -14; itemDef.modelRotationX = 1400; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -25; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -60; itemDef.name = "Korasi's Sword"; itemDef.description = "The sword of a Void Knight.".getBytes(); break;
and when I run the client, logg in, and spawn item 15099 (korasi’s sword) the client freezes…
here’s a picture…
[shadow=red,left]Can anyone help?[/shadow]
